author: amitsara
body:
<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 issues.

- Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6?view=powershell-6).

-->

# Details
DSC team needs to support DSC compilation on PowerShell core 6.2 for GuestConfiguration Custom Policy Public Preview.
Changes from following PRs has to be backported to enable the DSC compilation on Linux & Windows.
1.	Support DSC compilation on Linux.
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/9834
2.	Import-DscResource should allow to overwrite DSC built-in resources.
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/9879
3.	Download latest version (6.2.0) of PSDesiredStateConfiguration nuget package.
 https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/9932

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @amal-khalaf These are all the PRs?  You aren't expecting any more?

comments.author: amitsara
comments.body:
> @amal-khalaf These are all the PRs? You aren't expecting any more?

No, these are only the PRs need to be back ported.

comments.author: ThomasNieto
comments.body: Is 6.2 getting any new releases? If not, should this be closed?

title: Backport DSC compilation fixes to PowerShell Core 6.2.
